Description:
Detects extraction of files with usage of steghide binary, the adversaries may use this technique to prevent the detection of hidden information.

Author: Pawel Mazur
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Steganography Extract Files with Steghide
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where type = 'execve' and a0 = 'steghide' and a1 = 'extract' and a2 = '-sf' and (a3 like '%.jpg' or a3 like '%.png')
